1T1R SISO
"1241-00000719-50Z ES" is silkscreened on the board. The FCC test report lists the following models as identical... *Edimax EW-7811GLn, EW-7811Un, EW-7811UWn, GWU-H811GLn *[[Airlink101 AWLL5088]] *[[Sitecom WL-365]] *GETNET GN-521U Is the "Kootek KT-RPWF" (ASIN: B00FWMEFES) identical? It apparently uses the same "rtl8188cus" driver software. [[Category:English Documentation]]
